title: Sollividu Velli Nilave Song Lyrics Amaidhi Padai
stanzas:
<div>
Sollividu Velli Nilave Song Lyrics Amaidhi Padai

sollividu velli nilave
sollugindra seidhigalaiye (2)

uravugal kasaindhathammaa
oh oh kanavugal
kalaindhathammaa

kadhal ennum dheepame
kannil naanum yetrinen
kaatril kaaindhu ponapin
naane ennai thaetrinen.

sollividu velli nilave
sollugindra seidhigalaiye

uravugal kasaindhidumaa ?
oh oh kanavugal
kalaindhidumaa?

unnai orupodhum
ullam maravaadhu
naanthaan vaazhnthaen
o o o..

kuttram puriyaadhu
thunbakadal meedhu
yaen naan veezhnthen
o o o o

andha kadhai mudintha kadhai
enthan manam marandha kadhai
enna seiya vidikathai pol
ennudaiya pirandha kadhai

kaalangal thaan pona pinnum
kaayangal aaravillai o o
vedhanai theeravillai.

sollividu velli nilave
sollugindra seidhigalaiye

uravugal kasaindhidumaa ?
oh oh kanavugal
kalaindhidumaa? (2)

thotta kuraiyaavum
vitta kuraiyaagum
vendaam kadhal o o o

endhan vazhi veru
undhan vazhi veru
yeno koodal o o o

unnudaiya varavai enni
ullavarai kathiruppen
ennai vittu vilagi sendraal
marupadi theek kuzhippen

naan virumbum kadhalane
nee ennai yaetrukondaal
naan boomiyil vazhndhiruppen.

sollividu velli nilave
sollugindra seidhigalaiye

uravugal kasaindhathammaa
oh oh kanavugal
kalaindhathammaa

kadhal ennum dheepame
kannil naanum yetrinen
kaatril saaindhu pogumaa
Â nenjil vaithu yaetrinen.

sollividu velli nilave
sollugindra seidhigalaiye

uravugal kasaindhathammaa
oh oh kanavugal
kalaindhathammaa

uravugal kasaindhidumaa ?
oh oh kanavugal
kalaindhidumaa?
